title: OOL Team Night of Fire Looking For ADC and Support (HIgh Gold+)
body:
We are a team that plays online tournaments and strives to WIN. If you're not prepared to play seriously, join another team. 

**Roles Needed:**
ADC
Support

**Current Main Roster:**
Top: Z3npachi
Jungle: L A V A Zz
MId: StellarUmbra

**Requirements **
Must Be Currently Gold 3+ On OCE
Must Speak English 
Must Have Working Mic + Curse Voice
Must Attend All Tourneys and Team Practice Sessions (Excuses accepted but 3 consecutive no-shows will jeopardize your position) 
Must Be Able To Accept Criticism 
Must Be Focused On Individual And Team **Improvement**  

**Standard Schedule**
We usually play 1 Tournament per Week during the weekends, with a minimum of 1 Tournament per fortnight
At least 1 Team Practice/Scim Sessions Per Week (Time Flexible)
Example Tournament: 
https://battlefy.com/riot-games-oceanic-open-ladder/riot-games-oceanic-open-ladder-week-4/56b4adbb56e81f10035742a0/info
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment

To Join add StellarUmbra on lol or Comment on this post

replies.body: Sorry we're not looking for Junglers right now. But if we do require a replacement in the future. I'll get back to you <3

hi,
i know the requirement is gold 3+ but am gold 4 atm playing league consistently, I can ADC and maybe could be a sub or something so yeah
